CSSVariableString: /* ===== SteamUI-OldGlory will insert CSS Variables from variables.css here ==== */

classic.name: Classic Styling
classic.description: CSS for Old UI font and colors

sidebar_homeandsearch.name: Sidebar Home & Search
sidebar_homeandsearch.description: CSS for the Left Sidebar - Home and Search buttons

sidebar_gamelist.name: Sidebar GameList
sidebar_gamelist.description: CSS for the Left Sidebar - Games List

home_collections.name: Home & Collections
home_collections.description: CSS for HOME and COLLECTIONS page layout

gamepage_header.name: Gamepage Header
gamepage_header.description: CSS for the top gamepage header and game image

gamepage_sections.name: Gamepage Sections
gamepage_sections.description: CSS for the section boxes (Achievements, Friends Who Play, Screenshots, DLC...)

gamepage_boundary.name: Gamepage Boundary
gamepage_boundary.description: CSS for the glass/blur, and more details panel

gamepage_columns.name: Gamepage Columns
gamepage_columns.description: CSS for swapping the columns and their widths

gamepage_activitynews.name: Gamepage Activity & News
gamepage_activitynews.description: CSS for the compact Friends Activity/News

gamepage_events.name: Gamepage Events
gamepage_events.description: CSS affecting size of event boxes and images

module_gameproperties.name: [Module] Game Properties
module_gameproperties.description: CSS for Game Properties layout (incl. DLC Manager)

module_landscapegameimages.name: [Module] Landscape Game Images
module_landscapegameimages.description: (Requires JS) CSS for Horizontal Game Images

module_listview.name: [Module] List View
module_listview.description: (EXPERIMENTAL) (Requires JS) CSS for List view implementation

module_playbarbox.name: [Module] Play Bar Box
module_playbarbox.description: CSS for Play Bar pulled up into box (in gamepage header)

module_verticalnavbar.name: [Module] Vertical Nav Bar
module_verticalnavbar.description: (Requires JS) CSS for enabling a vertical navigation bar

module_classiclayout.name: [Module] Classic Layout
module_classiclayout.description: (Requires JS) (Requires Vertical Nav Bar) CSS for enabling classic layout

module_homeicon.name: [Module] Home Icon
module_homeicon.description: CSS for turning HOME button text into an icon

tweak_nozoom.name: [Tweak] No Zoom
tweak_nozoom.description: CSS for removing zoom/expand on game images when hovered
